pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build: Birth! TeleviTV!! VS Kamen Rider Grease (2017, Hyper Battle Video)$(br2)Used to access Build's $(l:build/riders/build#kumatv)Televi$(/l) forms
